item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 19, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Drift towards danger and the normalization of deviance (2017) (62 points | 28 comments)

26. A high-performance, zero-overhead, extensible Python compiler using LLVM (215 points | 76 comments)

29. Meticulous (YC S21) is hiring to eliminate UI tests ( | hide)
